title: Ticket #2902: User-specified attributes should not be overridden in contrib qmf
description: It is impossible to send job with qmf (from condor contrib section) with attribute ShouldTransferFiles "YES" or "IF_NEEDED". This attribute is everytime overriden to value "NO".
attachments:
• 0002-User-specified-attributes-should-not-be-overridden-b.patch 1524 bytes added by slebodnik on 2012-Mar-22 21:15:06 UTC.
    Similar problem was also solved in aviary package
    "/src/condor_contrib/aviary/src/SchedulerObject.cpp"

    commit 53048404c3d2625819172d0b51cbd92f14a4610b
check_ins: 2012-Mar-22 17:30   Check-in [30993]: User-specified attributes should not be overridden by default attributes. #2902 Signed-off-by: Peter MacKinnon <pmackinn@redhat.com> Committer: Peter MacKinnon (By Lukas Slebodnik )
